select count(*) from payment p JOIN trade t ON (p.tno=t.tno) where name = #{name}

SELECT label ,SUM(profit) AS profit FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR), '%Y') AS label ,0 AS profit FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(payDate, '%Y') AS label ,SUM(price) AS profit FROM payment WHERE payDate >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(payDate, '%Y')) a GROUP BY label

SELECT label ,SUM(profit) AS profit FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS label ,0 AS profit FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(payDate, '%Y-%m') AS label ,SUM(price) AS profit FROM payment WHERE payDate >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(payDate, '%Y-%m')) a GROUP BY label
